In fact it is what I do: repackaging the test suite which belongs to 
some one else.

but the prefer method is what I described previously.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> 
wrote:
> Dan Tran wrote:
> 
> > Hello, I have a need to dynamically remove a test
> > method out of a TestSuite given to me at run time.
> > 
> > I also know about the full class name and method name
> > of the tobe removed test method.
> > 
> > The TestSuite api has a method to return an
> > enumaration of Test.  This is where I should start?
> > 
> > Thanks for all advices
> 
> I don't know that this is possible. Describe the reason for 
removing a 
> test /as tests execute/. Why can't you do it by building the test 
suite 
> differently before then?
